title: Pita Pit
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fast food franchise offering pita pocket sandwiches. Could build your own sandwich with fillings include fresh veggies, hummus, falafel, babaganoush, and a black bean burger that's vegetarian not vegan. The falafel is cooked on the grill, and you could ask the staff to scrape both the grill and the tools before cooking for vegans.
